content: DoD-1: Implement DriftAdapter with setDelegate() and revokeDelegate() - return confirmed tx sigs
DoD-2: Implement placePostOnly(), placeStops(), cancelAndReplace(), closePositionMarket() in DriftAdapter
DoD-3: Build Binance CVD+VWAP signal worker - emit OrderIntent JSON to data/signals/solusdt-1m.jsonl
DoD-4: Implement risk & sizing guard - spread/depth/liq-gap/funding/basis checks + ATR trailing
DoD-5: Wire backend - POST /api/engine/orders with SIWS validation, WS engine.events fanout, persist to Mongo
DoD-6: Frontend delegate flow - setDelegate tx button, badge updates, revoke button, strategy toggle
Add security: CORS lock, CSRF protection, rate limiting (5/min/wallet on /orders)
Add VERSION.txt and return version in /api/engine/ping response
Acceptance Test 1: Delegation flow (create delegate → Active badge → revoke → Inactive)
Acceptance Test 2: Signal→Order (VWAP reclaim → engine receives intent → post-only placed on Drift)
Acceptance Test 3: Modify/Replace (unfilled order cancelled and replaced, max 2 attempts)
Acceptance Test 4: Stops/Targets (SL+TP ladder on fill, TP1→BE+fees, ATR trail active)
Acceptance Test 5: Kill-switch (over-spread condition → engine halts, cancels, logs)
Acceptance Test 6: Persistence (all events in /api/activity and ActivityLog panel)
